Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Arabian Courtyard Hotel & Spa, you'll be centrally located in Dubai, steps from Dubai Museum and Grand Mosque. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Textile Souk and Bastakiya.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 173 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a nightclub, a health club, and an outdoor pool. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the complimentary beach shuttle.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A shuttle from the hotel to the airport is complimentary at scheduled times.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a nightclub, a health club, and an outdoor pool. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the complimentary beach shuttle.
Make yourself at home in one of the 173 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Arabian Courtyard Hotel & Spa, you'll be centrally located in Dubai, steps from Dubai Museum and Grand Mosque. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Textile Souk and Bastakiya.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Dubai Museum - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Grand Mosque - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Textile Souk - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Bastakiya - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Spice Souk - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Gold Souk - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Perfume Souq - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Sheikh Saeed Al Maktoum House - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
The Dubai Heritage Village - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
BurJuman Mall - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Naif Souq - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Dubai Cruise Terminal - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Port Rashid - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Al Ghurair Centre - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Reef Mall - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Dubai (XNB-Dubai Bus Station) - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi

The preferred airport for Arabian Courtyard Hotel & Spa is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Arabian Courtyard Hotel & Spa is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Compulsory Tourism Dirham to be paid by guest directly to the hotel per room per night valid from 31st March 2014 Onward. No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. child sharing 3-12 years free on room only basis. no name change. Children are not allowed in gala dinner. NOTE: The hotel will be upgrading lower floors of our rooms at the hotel effective 1st June to 20th October 2017. It’s a soft refurbishment of interior which includes wall paper, polishing and upholstery of the furniture and change of curtains, etc. We are also remodelling the bathrooms, providing modern accessories and sanitary wares. There is no major civil work planned at the site. However, to keep the noise factor to minimal, job will be carried out at the workshop and fit-out will take place in the rooms during civilized hours only. work will undergo from 10:00hrs to 18:00hrs to avoid any guest inconvenience. NOTE: Executive Lounge will be close for service from 03 May Until 31 August 2018.

Essential Information:
Dubai Tourism Dirham Fee applies from 31.03.14 to be paid bythe guest directly at the Hotel/Hotel apartment. Following fee is applicable per bedroom per night- 20 Aed:5 star hotel/Deluxe hotel apart - 15 Aed:4 star hotel/Superior hotel apart-10 Aed :3 and 2 star hotel/Standard hotel apart-7 Aed :1 Applicable from 27/Mar/2014 to 31/Dec/9999
Early departure fee may apply Applicable from 14/May/2018 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: Executive Lounge will be close for daily operations from 03 May Until 31 August 2018. The guests who are entitled for lounge access will be advised the alternative venue upon their arrival for their executive room entitlements. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999
